snippet: ZION--Abraham. SAR mourns the passing of Abe Zion, a founder of SAR and pillar of the Riverdale community. We extend our heartfelt condolences to his children, Joshua, Mark, Adina and grandchildren. May the family be comforted amongst the mourners of Zion and Jerusalem. Jack C. Bendheim, President 1/3
